name: haproxy
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.install:all: npm i; cd ./haproxy; npm i; cd ..;concurrently 'cd ./react; npm i' 'cd ./backend; npm i'
scripts.compile: MODE=prod_standalone concurrently 'cd backend; npm run build' 'cd react; npm run build'
scripts.compile:docker: MODE=prod_docker concurrently 'cd backend; npm run build' 'cd react; npm run build'
scripts.prepare: MODE=prod_standalone npm run clean; npm run compile; mkdir build; cp -r react/build ./build/public; cp -r backend/build/* ./build/
scripts.prepare:docker: MODE=prod_docker npm run clean; npm run compile:docker; npm run prepare:docker:postbuild
scripts.prepare:docker:postbuild: mkdir build; cp -r react/build ./build/client; cp -r backend/build ./build/server; npm run prepare:docker:haproxy
scripts.dev: MODE=development concurrently 'cd backend; npm run dev' 'cd react; npm run start'
